title: ReminderEvent
description: Schema for events signaling that a reminder is due.

reminderId.description: The unique identifier of the reminder.

taskId.description: The unique identifier of the task the reminder is for.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who owns the reminder.

title.description: Title of the task the reminder is for.

description.description: Description of the task the reminder is for.

reminderTime.description: The exact time the reminder was scheduled to fire in ISO 8601 format.

notificationChannel.description: Preferred channel for notification (e.g., email, app_push, websocket).
